38212359.review:
Awesome puzzle, as the other Quell games.
And there are literally tons of puzzles! Much more variety than ever!
Of course, if you're going to perfect every single level well it will take you some time :)
Anyways it's great, the whole series but this one in particular. And they're not related, so you can learn and start everything here even if this is your first Quell.
Graphics and music are great, and keyboard controls too are perfect.
The game's mechanics are quite easy to understand - you have to obtain all the orbs by guiding with your directional keys one or more bubbles and dealing with the increasing obstacles and difficulties that the game will pose. They're all very intuitive anyways and you'll never be stuck :)
The new mechanics too add much variety to this game so that it isn't definitely the same as the other Quell games!
4€ may be a little too much, but this one to me is one of the best puzzle/logic series on Steam on every aspect so if you love these kinds of games you won't be disappointed for sure, and it has a lot of replayability value too being that long and different :)

37988123.review: Better and improved from the first quell game. They added some extra features and mechanics to make the levels more challenging and interesting. In general I think it was a really good relaxing puzzle game.

37852868.review:
衫果买的合集 很值
游戏难度还行 能接受
而且通过就有全成就 美滋滋

36868184.review:
Quell Reflect is a story about a man.
A man, who dont want remember.

35848678.review:
This is the second installment in the Quell series and arguably the weakest. If you liked Quell (the first part), this is more of the same with a few new mechanics, most prominently multiple player-controlled bubbles. Over-all it is harder than the previous and at times felt pretty tedious. 

I woudln't recommend buying it stand-alone. But do pick it up as part of the Collection, as the first part felt a little more accessible and fun and the third (Quell Memento) is easily the best.

35589581.review: Logická hra s kapkou vody v které sbíráte perly.

34825281.review:
Absolutely wonderful puzzle game from the beginning till the very end.

Quell Reflect is a logical game with very simple rules yet various and challenging levels. The aim of the game is to get all small orbs while guiding big bubbles with as few moves as possible. Those big spheres can go only in four basic directions, but once they move they stop only on obstacles. Except ordinary walls, there are also deadly traps which pop our bubbles. 
There is no rush while playing, there is not a ticking clock. The quick precise movement is not required neither. What is really needed is a good thinking.
Even though some levels are difficult, the player has always a chance to buy a solution with coins that they receive for solving levels. Solving only the easiest puzzles should give enough coins to smoothly go through the harder ones.

The game is created in bright pastel colours, which along a calm beautiful soundtrack compose an unique atmosphere. 84 levels are shared into groups of 4 and every group has a different nice background picture. All those things brings tranquility and some kind of meditation.

In my opinion, Quell Reflect is a game for everyone. It is like taking a break from a daily rush.

33886116.review: "Quell Reflect" is very similar to it's predecessor, "Quell."  The developer added two new play mechanics:  movable pins and gold pearl/block pairs.  Unfortunately, they also seemed to have made many more of the puzzles hard.  It took me 9.6 hours to complete the game with 100% Achievements.  BUT, I had to use a LOT of walkthroughs.  Very frustrating.  I'd have preferred easier puzzles, so I'm right on the border with the game.  If you liked "Quell," and don't mind tough puzzles, then I have no problem recommending the game to you.  If you don't care about Achievements (so finding that hidden gem and getting the puzzles done in the minimum number of moves doesn't matter to you), I again recommend the game whole-heartedly.  But, if you're a perfectionist, a completionist, and get frustrated with tough puzzles, you might think twice about "Quell Reflect."  Still, two out of those three groups should be happy with the game, so I'm sticking with my Recommended rating even though I wasn't overjoyed with the game.

32922648.review:
[b]You might like if:[/b] You enjoyed the original Quell and love laid-back zen puzzlers.

If it ain't broke...

The second instalment of the enchanting Quell series, offering up another neat collection of 80+ levels. It retains the wonderfully familiar mechanics, style and gorgeous soundtrack from before, but augments them with some fun new elements. Some levels now involve multiple rain drops, and others have gold blocks which can only be removed if you find a golden pearl first. They blend seamlessly into the existing game, enriching an already serene puzzler.

The difficulty has scaled nicely, creating a very natural progression from the first title - ultimately making it hard not to love if you enjoyed the first one.

32828009.review: 后面有的关卡要想挺久的，总的来说还是很不错的益智小游戏=A=

31637312.review: Great puzzle game. There is a "coin system" that allows you to show the perfect solution if you are stuck; these coins are earned (not bought) through normal gameplay. Well worth it at full price, but I bought this game (via the quell collection) on sale while I knew next to nothing about it. Very happy with my purchase.

30446422.review: Really good puzzles but recommend playing with volume turned down as the music is Very repetitive and will drive you spare when you are trying to concentrate.

29740637.review: Il seguito del puzzle game Quell, anche se è molto simile al suo predecessore non posso non consigiarlo. Anche qui è presente una bella soundtrack e vi rilasserà intrattenendovi per qualche ora. Vale assolutamente il prezzo sopratutto in sconto e in bundle con gli alti Quell.

29572136.review:
[h1]Personal Rating: 10/10[/h1]

Just like its predecessors it's a zen game, which does everything right. The puzzles are challenging and the whole atmosphere of the game is totally chilly. Some game mechanics have been added. They don't make it a whole new game, but they make sure, that Quell Reflect doesn't just feel like a copy of Quell.

28516568.review:
Das Spiel ist sehr gut.

Das Spiel ist fast identisch zu seinem Vorgänger Quell (Rezension [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198063825413/recommended/344480]hier[/url]).

Aber auch mit Kenntnis des ersten Teils ist das Spiel, seine Level, keineswegs langweilig. Man hat einige interessante zusätzliche Elemente, die den Rätseln neue Tiefe geben. Insgesamt finde ich die Rätsel merklich schwerer als beim Vorgänger.

Unverändert blieb die Steuerung und das Design, beides sehr gut. Die Musik ist etwas anders, immer noch gut.

Auch hier war jeder Level deutlich anders und so kam auch diesmal keine Langeweile auf.

Pro & Contra:

+ Sehr schöne, simple aber unterhaltsame Spielidee
+ Meist anspruchsvolle Level
+ Undo-Funktion
+ Gutes Design

- (Fällt mir nichts ein)

Wertung: 10/10

Dieses Spiel hat mir viel Rätselspaß gegeben.

[i]Genau genommen bin ich noch nicht durch, ich hebe mir den Rest für später auf.[/i]

28363385.review:
Quell 에서 난이도가 약간 상승했지만 그 외에는 크게 발전한 것이 없다. 총 7*3*4 =84 + 숨겨진 퍼즐4개로 구성된다. 대체적으로 어렵지 않은 편이지만, 몇몇 퍼즐은 어려워서 고민하다 잠들곤 했다. 이걸 하면서 잠든횟수가 3번은 되는 듯하다. 퍼즐 자체로서는 깔끔하고 재밌는 편이라서 퍼즐을 좋아하는 사람에게 추천한다.

개인평점 7/10

26290591.review: 和前作 Quell 连着一起玩的，实际上相似的内容挺多的，难度也差不多。如果喜欢这个系列的话还是推荐玩一玩的。

25581470.review:
이런 게임은 뭐 그냥 추천임

25067187.review: A very simple, yet well executed puzzle game. Great presentation with relaxing music and polished visuals. A good range of achievments, leaderboard and some nice bonus collectible gems to add replayability. Well worth the price of admission. GG!

24978116.review: Excellent game, you can controll it by keyboard, gamepad or mouse. Just resolve logic puzzles and listen to beautiful classical music. It is very relaxing game, super after hard day. I bought two parts of this game in the sales and I am going to buy the other two parts for normal price to support the developer.

24747746.review: everything I said about quell [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/dohi64/recommended/344480/]here[/url] still applies. it's more of the same, which is good news in this case, but there are some new blocks and mechanics to keep things interesting, so if you liked quell, play reflect too, it's great.

24623162.review: Bought the Quell trio bundle pack which I very much recommend. It's almost like meditating yet you're still gently using your brain with each puzzle set just a little more difficult or more interesting than the last set. And you can redo when you either have gotten yourself to a point where you can't win. Or you want to try again with less moves. And I'm a sucker for game controller support. This game absolutley does not need it. However, they provide it better than some action games I own! It's nice to not be tied to a keyboard but instead sit back and relax with the controller. Love the music. The game is interesting. Relaxing. Falls into the box of good-for-you brain games. You lose track  of time. You don't feel frustrated when you're done. It's like being engrossed in a good book and after a bit you look up and realize your surroundings around you. You feel refreshed and recharged. And, again, relaxed yet challenged just a bit. No other game like this out there. Kudos to the developers for originality!

24489278.review:
[h1]Quell Reflect —— 水滴解谜:反射 [/h1]
同样轻松舒适的第二部
保持了前作的整体框架，关卡设计上增加了新的元素
这种熟悉的配方，不一样的味道，在休闲解谜游戏中还是很讨巧的

+整体画面很舒服
+音乐让人很放松
+自带官中 
+关卡难度进阶做得很好。前期轻松，后期烧脑
+增加了新的解谜元素
+对成就党依然非常友好 
（到了中后期的烧脑关，不想被烧脑依然可以用富裕的金币买提示怼过去）
+成就图标好看

-是的，我还是看不惯标题的美术=-=

24453589.review: 相当于初代的升级版？其实推荐三作一起入，真的好玩。

24384883.review:
[h1]"The Quell of deja vus"[/h1]
The Quell collection is a triplet of decent challenging puzzle games. I recommend to buy all three parts in a bundle on sale. Basically you shift orbs throught logical buildup labrinths to collect all pearls with a limit of moves. In higher levels there are added some elements like poisoned orbs, spikes or portals. You can also get stuck in infinite loops. Each level contains a hidden jewel you must find in a second playthrough. The controls are sometimes buggy viewing the game is made for touchpad but it uses mouse pointer swipe instead of arrow keys. So you can accidently do a double move.

Quell Reflect is technical a remake of part1. the puzzles are not similar, but seem easier. Altogether 84 puzzles stacked by year numbers (?) 7 years x 3 blocks a 4 puzzles.

24349124.review:
S tunajších komentárov na Steame som nadobudol dojem, že ide v prvom rade skôr o relaxačnú hru, než o logickú, lebo nejaké zložité hlavolamy riešiť celý deň sa mi teda nechcelo... A práve tu na Steame vlastním vďaka darovanému kľúču len túto druhú časť trilógie, s podtitulom Reflect, ale vedel som, že ide vo všetkých častiach stále o to isté.... Posúvať kvapku vody po sklenenej okennej tabuli, zbierať perly, vyhýbať sa hrotom a riešiť rôzne nástrahy.
Prečo teda označujem túto hru za relaxačnú? Nejde len o to, že hranie je podfarbené jemnou a relaxačnou hudbou skladateľa Stevena Cravisa, ale o to, že má systém nápovede, kedy každú úroveň prejdete pomerne jednoducho a bez akéhokoľvek podvodu. Nadobudol som jasný dojem, že hra chce navodiť pohodovú, aj keď silne melancholickú atmosféru, a to sa iste tvorcom podarilo. Na obyčajnú logickú hru celkom úspech. Nostalgiu navodzuje aj nenápadne vložený príbeh o láske, životnej strate. Navyše postupne vďaka vhodne zvoleným ručne maľovaným pozadiam vidíte, že sa pomaly blíži jeseň života, vyhorenie vzťahu až po konečný zimný mráz - teda vašu smrť.
Hru teda môžem odporučiť aj tým, ktorý sa neradi frustrujú, táto hra skutočne nie je prioritne o zložitých hlavolamoch.

Pro: Hudba, ktorá môže hrať celé hodiny a iste vám nepôjde na nervy, skôr naopak.

Proti: Stále iba vo svojej podstate obyčajná logická hra, ktorých sú stovky...

24099901.review:
[h1] Quell シリーズQuellの続編というかそのまんま [/h1]

個人的には前と変わらない Quellが好きならｂ

[h1] ゲーム内容  [/h1]

動かすと物に当たるまで止まれない青い球でパール(白い球)を取るゲーム、今回も隠しコレクションアイテムなどもあるよ同じだけどｗ

前作よりも難易度は高くなったような気がするが今回も序盤でコインを集め、終盤でコインで答え合わせで楽々プレイです。

やはりBGMや雰囲気を楽しみながらやるパズルゲームです。

[h1] 個人的に思った事や感想など [/h1]

前作と同じで雰囲気やBGMはいい、パズルに関してもヒント機能が優秀なのでというか答え合わせみたいな感じだがｗ

24055466.review:
IMPORTANT: THE GAME MIGHT NOT RUN ON A 32 OR 64-BIT WINDOWS 7. IF YOUR OS IS EITHER OF THAT YOU BUY THE GAME WITH A RISK OF NOT BEING ABLE TO RUN IT AT ALL. FOR MORE INFO CLICK - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/344480/discussions/0/358415738208879896/]HERE.[/url]

As I wrote in my review for "Quell" I bought all three games and completed them with all achievements. "Quell Reflect" adds a few things to the first one and is interesting if you're into puzzle games. Thankfully, there's a guide with solutions of each level. Got the game for under 1 euro which is a fair price, I'd say. Recommend buying "Quell Reflect" if it's on sale and/or if you like puzzle games.

23288734.review:
While this is objectively a good puzzle game, I'd only recommend it if you're a hardcore puzzle player and you enjoy spending hours trying to perfect a single stage. Perhaps play it when you're finished with the first and third games in the trilogy.

Indeed, it feels like a direct follow-up to the first one, expects you to have played it, and ups difficulty a lot, mostly through the increased number of moves needed to finish most stages. It also lacks a bit in new mechanics.

Finally, don't bother with achievements: getting perfect moves everywhere will take you too long, and get you nowhere.

22578372.review:
If you have played Quell then all you need to know is 
- This game is of the same quality of the first one 
- There's new elements and the puzzles are not a copy of the old ones

You don't need to have played Quell. You can start with this one. 
If possible, though, I'd recommend playing the whole collection in the proper order: Quell, Quell Reflection and Quell Memento.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Copy of my review for Quell, as it applies to this one:
- The levels are well designed with a difficulty going from easy to hard (but not too hard) levels
- No timer at all
- You can play as as little as you want and continue where you left off or go back to previous levels to complete unfinished objectives
- A few levels are hard to finish but a perfect number of moves but there's no penalty for retrying them (there's even an achievement for that!) so you can be persistent or use coins that you obtain by perfecting levels
- Finding and getting the jewel in every level gives you a different objective
- Not a huge number of puzzles but more than adequate for the price

It's very well done too:
- Graphics, music and sound are nice and polished
- Graphic options work as the should (several fixed resolutions, full screen, windowed mode)
- Music and sounds can be muted separately
- Movement can be controlled with keyboard
- Resetting a level or going to the next one can also be done with keyboard

22412760.review: Quell Reflect is the second in the Quell trilogy and is a fantastic relaxing puzzle game. This game introduces some new mechanics from the first game but they fit in nicely and add some nice variety. Like the first game its not too challanging unless you're going for the perfect solution. I would reccomend buying the whole Quell collection.

21954851.review:
パズルゲーム。
Quellの続編。押すと障害物にぶつかるまで押した方向に進み続ける雨粒を動かして全てのパールを集めるパズルだ。全84ステージ。
ゲームや画面の構成は前作から変わっていない。新たなルールが追加されているくらいで基本的には前作と同じような内容だ。続編というよりはスタンドアロンな拡張、またはVer1.5的な内容になっている。新しい要素として複数の雨粒を操作するステージがあったり、ブロックの種類が増えている。また、若干難易度が前作よりも上がっているような印象を受けた。
前作同様にシンプルルールで手軽にプレイできる良いパズルだ。プレイするなら前作からプレイすることをオススメする。

20962296.review: Following the original Quell, Quell Reflect adds more levels with even more challenges. It also includes a bigger soundtrack playlist, which has added great value to the game.

20863772.review:
I love simple puzzle games.  By "simple"  I mean sparse game rules or elemnts and deep logic or thinking to solve them.  I also appreciate progress that is measured by number of moves or thinking and not high speed or split second button pushes.  So, some of my favorites are, Bejeweled Twist, Gyromancer, Cogs, KAMI, LYNE, Zen Bound 2 and so on.
Quell: Reflect fits right in with those.

I have never played the other Quell games before.  But I will now. 
I did get this game on a great sale, but it is well worth the full price.
The puzzles are seemingly simplistic in design, but very challenging.  I have to be careful how long I play because the time will pass very quickly while doing so.
Finally, the visual design is very interesting and well done.  I enjoy the overall theme of the game graphics and colors that are chosen.  The experience is very relaxing and definitely not boring.

If you appreciate the type of puzzle games I described or like any of the ones I named above, then I would give it a closer look and see what you think.

19706149.review: Quell Reflect continues to provide a soothing puzzle solving experience with its combination of simple gameplay mechanics and mesmerizingly relaxing soundtrack. Much of the same is presented but of course there are brand new puzzles to lament over. Take the break every now and then with Quell Reflect in your mind and soul.

19310610.review:
★★★★★★★☆☆☆ - 7/10

Gleiche Qualität wie der 1. Teil, nur mit neuen Rätseln und ein paar neuen Elementen. Deswegen ändert sich an der Bewertung nichts...

Quell Reflect ist ein entspannender Puzzler der dank eingebautem Guide auch nicht frustrierend wird. 
Insgesamt hat man an 84 Puzzles mehr oder weniger zu knappern.

Großes Lob an den Entwickler, so kompfortabel soll ein Spiel sein:
- Lautstärke und Bildschirmmodus einstellbar
- lokalisiert in mehrere Sprachen
- Controller wird erkannt auch wenn er nach dem Spielstart eingeschaltet wird und das Spiel erkennt auch wenn man im Spiel die Steuerung wechselt.

- Steamerrungenschaften (die auch im Spiel etwas wert sind)

Fehlen eigentlich nur noch für unsere nicht genormten Spieler eine 
konfigurierbare Steuerung (auch wenn die Grundeinstellung perfekt ist) und Steam-Sammelkarten :D

Danke Fallen Tree Games,
hat mir auf dem Smartphone schon gefallen und wurde auf den PC wunderbar portiert.
Freu mich schon auf das nächste eurer Projekte :D

18599524.review:
[i][b]Quell Reflect[/b][/i], c'est [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/344480][i][b]Quell[/b][/i][/url] augmenté de nouvelles mécaniques de jeu et d'une bonne dose de difficulté supplémentaire. Si vous avez aimé le premier, nul doute que vous aimerez le second.

[h1]Verdict : 4,5/5 - Excellent, à acheter les yeux fermés ![/h1]

18048094.review: There is more variety in this epidose than in the first one and it's harder. But with the helping system, you can't be blocked.

17065251.review:
[h1]Quell Reflect fait parti de The Quell Logic Collection[/h1]

Quell Reflect est le second épisode de la trilogie Quell Collection.

Le design (graphisme et musique) est tout aussi soigné avec un côté plus familial et chaleureux que Quell. 

L’objectif du jeu est le même que pour Quell. « Vous dirigez une goutte d’eau dans un tableau et vous devez ramasser toutes les perles du tableau. La contrainte, c’est de faire cela en un minimum de déplacement. » Notez qu’une seconde goutte apparaît sur Quell Reflect, ça complique les choses !

La réaction des joueurs est très positive et c’est normal, c’est un excellent jeu à un prix très agréable.

[url=www.graal.fr/2015/05/29/test-the-quell-logic-collection-la-version-pour-steam/]N’hésitez pas à lire toutes mes impressions sur The Quell Logic Collection.[/url]

16191862.review: I have been in love with Quell ever since the orginal game was launched on iOS, and it is a joy to play. I couldn't recommend this series of games enough, they are so relaxing yet so challenging. The perfect blend. Thank you, FalllenTree!

15897591.review: Great, relaxing puzzle game, as are the other two Quell games. Played on my phone originally, but won a free copy of this and the Windows port is very good. Nice to have in a window doing puzzles while looking at Twitter.

15828446.review:
Quell Reflect is a follow-up to the amazingly polished puzzle game Quell. This sequel takes to mechanics of the first game and adds a simple yet complex tweak to it. Controlling two (or more) droplets on the screen at the same time! 

The game even has a few remixed versions of levels from the first game, but that you must solve in new and challenging ways! A few other mechanics have been implemented to allow for a greater variety of level designs.

Just as polished as Quell, and with even more beautiful music, Quell Reflect is truly worth any price as a sequel, and is amazing even as a standalone game. I really recommend picking this up today!
